Package com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.functions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConvertedArgument<I>
    A ConvertedArgument is the result of processing an FunctionArgument to validate its correctness and to convert it into an object of the required type.
    FunctionDefinitionAccessPermitted
    FunctionDefinitionAccessPermitted implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML access-permitted predicate.
    FunctionDefinitionAccessPermittedTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test NOT IMPLEMENTED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! This function is not yet implemented so these tests intentionally fail.
    FunctionDefinitionArithmetic<T extends java.lang.Number>
    FunctionDefinitionArithmetic extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML Arithmetic predicates as functions taking one or two arguments of the same data type and returning a single value of the same type.
    FunctionDefinitionArithmeticTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionBag<I>
    FunctionDefinitionBag implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML 'type'-bag predicates as functions taking 0, 1 or multiple arguments of the same data type and returning a Bag.
    FunctionDefinitionBagIsIn<I>
    FunctionDefinitionBagIsIn implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML 'type'-is-in predicates as functions taking two arguments, the first of type and the second of type Bag, and returning a Boolean for whether the first argument is contained in the second.
    FunctionDefinitionBagIsInTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionBagOneAndOnly<I>
    FunctionDefinitionBagOneAndOnly implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML 'type'-one-and-only predicates as functions taking one Bag argument and returning the single element in that bag of the 'type'.
    FunctionDefinitionBagOneAndOnlyTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionBagSize<I>
    FunctionDefinitionBagSize implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML 'type'-bag-size predicates as functions taking one Bag argument and returning an Integer representing the number of elements in the bag.
    FunctionDefinitionBagSizeTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionBagTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionBase<O,I>
    /** FunctionDefinitionBase provides a common base for FunctionDefinitions.
    FunctionDefinitionBaseTest
    Test functions in the abstract FunctionDefinitionSimpleTest class.
    FunctionDefinitionComparison<I extends java.lang.Comparable<I>>
    FunctionDefinitionComparison implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML comparison predicates as functions taking two arguments of the same type and returning a Boolean.
    FunctionDefinitionComparisonTest
    Test FunctionDefinitionComparison TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionDateTimeArithmetic<O extends IDateTime<O>,I extends ISO8601Duration>
    FunctionDefinitionDateTimeArithmetic implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML Date and Time Arithmetic predicates.
    FunctionDefinitionDateTimeArithmeticTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionEquality<I>
    FunctionDefinitionEquality extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML Equality predicates as functions taking two arguments of the same data type and returning a Boolean.
    FunctionDefinitionEqualityTest
    Test FunctionDefinitionEquality, all of its super-classes, and all XACML functions supported by that class.
    FunctionDefinitionHigherOrderBag<O,I>
    FunctionDefinitionSet implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML Set predicates as functions taking two arguments of Bag the same primitive type and returning either a Boolean or a Bag of the same primitive type.
    FunctionDefinitionHigherOrderBagTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple<O,I>
    FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple extends com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.functions.FunctionDefinitionSimple with utility methods for ensuring the types of the arguments passed in the evaluate method matches the parameterized type, and the number of arguments is correct.
    FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimpleTest
    FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple is an abstract class, so we have to test it by creating a sub-class.
    FunctionDefinitionLogical
    FunctionDefinitionLogical extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML Logic predicates as functions taking zero, one, or multiple arguments of type Boolean and returning a Boolean.
    FunctionDefinitionLogicalTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionNumberTypeConversion<O extends java.lang.Number,I extends java.lang.Number>
    FunctionDefinitionNumberTypeConversion extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML predicates foc converting Double to Integer and vice versa.
    FunctionDefinitionNumberTypeConversionTest
    Tests for various classes containing only one function.
    FunctionDefinitionRegexpMatch<I>
    FunctionDefinitionRegexMatch implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML 'type'-regex-match predicates as functions taking two arguments, the first of String, representing a regular expression, and the second of the type for that specific predicate, and returning a Boolean for whether the regular expression matches the string representation of the second argument.
    FunctionDefinitionRegexpMatchTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionRFC822NameMatch
    FunctionDefinitionRFC822NameMatch extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML RFC822Name match predicate as functions taking one String and one RFC822Name arguments and returning a single Boolean value.
    FunctionDefinitionSet<O,I>
    FunctionDefinitionSet implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML Set predicates as functions taking two arguments of Bag the same primitive type and returning either a Boolean or a Bag of the same primitive type.
    FunctionDefinitionSetTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionSpecialMatchTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionStringConversion<O,I>
    FunctionDefinitionNumberTypeConversion extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML predicates for converting String to DataType and vice versa.
    FunctionDefinitionStringConversionTest
    Tests for converting objects to/from Strings.
    FunctionDefinitionStringEqualIgnoreCase
    FunctionDefinitionStringEqualIgnoreCase extends FunctionDefinitionEquality for String arguments by testing for equality without regard to case.
    FunctionDefinitionStringEqualIgnoreCaseTest
    Only one function to test here.
    FunctionDefinitionStringFunctions<O,I>
    FunctionDefinitionStringFunctions implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML String Functions predicates except for the conversions between String and DataType which are contained in FunctionDefinitionStringConversion.
    FunctionDefinitionStringFunctionsTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionStringNormalize
    FunctionDefinitionStringNormalize extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML String normalization predicates as functions taking one String arg and returning a single value of the same type.
    FunctionDefinitionStringNormalizeTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionTimeInRange<I>
    FunctionDefinitionTimeInRange implements FunctionDefinition to implement the XACML time-in-range predicates as a function taking three arguments of type Time and returning a Boolean.
    FunctionDefinitionURIStringConcatenate Deprecated
    FunctionDefinitionURIStringConcatenateTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
    FunctionDefinitionX500NameMatch
    FunctionDefinitionX500NameMatch extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML X500Name match predicate as functions taking two X500Name arguments and returning a single Boolean value.
    FunctionDefinitionXPath<O>
    FunctionDefinitionXPath extends FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple to implement the XACML XPath predicates as functions taking one or two XPathExpression arguments and returning either an Integer or a Boolean.
    FunctionDefinitionXPathTest
    Test of PDP Functions (See XACML core spec section A.3) TO RUN - use jUnit In Eclipse select this file or the enclosing directory, right-click and select Run As/JUnit Test
